problem:
open Nat

-- 定义加法函数
def add : Nat → Nat → Nat
  | zero, m => m
  | succ n', m => succ (add n' m)

-- 定义乘法函数
def mul : Nat → Nat → Nat
  | zero, _ => zero
  | succ p, m => add m (mul p m)

-- 证明加法结合律：add n (add m p) = add (add n m) p，使用 sorry 代替证明
theorem addAssoc (n m p : Nat) : add n (add m p) = add (add n m) p := by
  sorry

-- 证明乘法对加法的右分配律：mul (add n m) p = add (mul n p) (mul m p)
theorem mulAddDistrR (n m p : Nat) : mul (add n m) p = add (mul n p) (mul m p) := by
